GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.15.71
GSD.description:
arm64: topology: fix possible overflow in amu_fie_setup()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.71 by commit 3c3edb82d67b2be9231174ac2af4af60d4af7549, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit cd0ed03a8903a0b0c6fc36e32d133d1ddfe70cd6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: arm64: topology: fix possible overflow in amu_fie_setup()
